p: The student t-test was used for statistical analyses in this study. The repeat times for each experiment are described in the figure legends or main text. The software Prism 6 (GraphPad) was used to perform statistical analysis. Statistical significance is defined as, n.s., not significant, ∗ p < 0.05, ∗∗ p < 0.01, ∗∗∗ p < 0.001, **** p < 0.0001.
